Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Really? Is that what you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Nothing strange about that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But she is different. Even though she's never been to Earth herself, she's had all sorts of unrealistic fantasies about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'When she was still around, she used to always ask me if there are any humans left on Earth.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla closes her eyes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Our primary school teachers all said that it was the cradle of life and our birthplace.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'But due to the Punishing Virus, we were forced to temporarily leave its embrace and protect her from Babylonia.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'So, Ayla, do you think there are still people on Earth?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I think so. Not everyone evacuated during Operation Acadia. There's bound to still be people on the surface."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't our textbooks say that there were billions of people on the surface at one point?"}
{2: '???', 3: "Billions? There's no way Babylonia could support that many people..."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Obviously. It could probably only support a small fraction of the population.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'My thoughts exactly.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'One day, we will reunite with our comrades on the surface. When that time comes, we will share in the marvelous things we have seen and rejoice in song.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Nothing is more romantic. Is it not?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla opens her eyes.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We were so naive back then. Always sharing our childish fantasies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'She told me how romantic it would be to reunite with our comrades on the surface...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We will share in the marvelous things we have seen and rejoice in song.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But we never considered at the time...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Why had those on the surface not come to Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What sort of life would they have had on the surface?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What would people on the surface think of us?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'Your vision returns. There are no wonders to be found here. Only helpless dismay.'}
{3: 'Seeing you lost in thought again, Hans furrows his eyebrows.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "Gray Raven Commandant, you can't even bother to follow orders now, I take it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No, it's not that. Commandant is...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi scans you with his peripheral vision as if in contemplation.'}
{3: 'Hans speaks directly—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "Enough. I don't have time for your excuses.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "Begin evacuating the refugees. If they aren't willing to cooperate, resort to more coercive measures.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before the other three can respond—'}
{2: "I don't agree with this.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'This kind of coercion ignores the will of others.', 3: '54'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'Are you defying orders, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: 'Watch your attitude and every statement you make.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "You don't want to get court-martialed when all of this is said and done.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee stands in front of you.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Please give us some more time. Not all of the nodes have been deployed yet, have they?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "That's right, but let me make myself clear. Once the nodes are fully deployed, Babylonia will obliterate the surrounding area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "If you don't wish to be decimated along with it, I suggest you hurry up and complete your mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Finished speaking, Hans turns and leaves.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Yawn... Well... Looks like I'm not needed here anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Catch ya later. I'm gonna recharge my batteries.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'Knocking open the door to the residence—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sir, Babylonia is going to unleash a wide-scale attack on the surrounding area. Please gather your family and evacuate immediately.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee', 3: 'Where do we evacuate to?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv bites her lip.'}
{3: 'Because the answer is simple—nowhere.'}
{3: 'Eden has no extra "tickets,"" and there is no place on the surface that can be called a ""safe refuge."'}
{3: 'The conservation area has not yet been built, and there is simply no way to accommodate all the displaced people.'}
{3: 'At present, there is only just enough time to evacuate the refugees to an area that will not be affected by the blast.'}
{3: "The refugee smiles sarcastically at Liv's silence."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee', 3: 'Enough with the hypocrisy. Is this really in our best interest? Or do you just not want to see us die before your very eyes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee', 3: 'Look at you. Your conscience is just as repulsive as your actions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee', 3: "Removing us from our homeland will make you sleep better at night, but it won't make our lives any better.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's not what we intend on—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The refugee slams the door in their faces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's the fourth household.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why are they so stubborn?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The old man... seems to be their leader.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If he is willing to leave, others will probably follow.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory316.png'}
{3: 'After several more doors slam in their faces..'}
{3: 'A familiar face opens the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Man', 3: "Ah... I know why you're here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia nods.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Then you should know my answer. I already told you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I still don't get it... Why? Is it because we aren't looking at this from your point of view?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "I'm sure you understand, kiddo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "Our point of view isn't as different from yours as you think.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'In your eyes, what is Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a bastion for humanity's strongest—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "No. That's not what I asked. I mean what was Babylonia before the Punishing Virus and the Great Evacuation?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It was humanity's first FTL colonization ship.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "Then why hasn't it taken you all into deep space?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because we lost Earth and want to take it back.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Why do you want to take it back?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Our mission is to take back humanity's homeland.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That is our mission. That is the meaning of our existence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'But this homeland is no longer of any use to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Cities destroyed; civilizations collapsed. Earth is now just a sea of ruins.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Babylonia floats above Earth, just like we stand here in these ruins. Why not leave?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Have you ever thought that taking back Earth might be meaningless?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "Now you are a Construct, not a human being. You don't need to inherit the meaning of human existence.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia wavers slightly.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, you're wrong. This is what we were born to do...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "That may have been why you were created, but that doesn't mean it has to be why you continue to exist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Much like how people should live, but they shouldn\'t just "live."" There are far more important things than to ""just live."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Do you understand now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia closes her eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is the path I chose. Just like this is the path each of you has chosen.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The old man smiles faintly.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Exactly. This is the path we chose, and this is the meaning we give our lives.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "We have nothing left. Our only driving force left is our attachment to this land. It's the only thing that supports our menial existence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Our last wish is to forever rest within its embrace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "You think we're unreasonable choosing to die rather than to leave. I think you're being equally unreasonable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'The irony of man. People can never reach a real mutual understanding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'This land is our blood, sweat and tears. Our history. Our memories. Everything we created, cherished, loved, and lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "As I have said, if you still have an ounce of compassion, please don't deprive us of our last request.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Please respect our last will.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee steps forward and pats Lucia on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Sorry to bother you. Goodbye.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as you are about to leave, you hear a commotion nearby.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Woman', 3: "Don't you think it's ridiculous to tell us that we are also citizens of the World Government?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woman', 3: "Don't you remember how you treated us when the evacuation started?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woman', 3: 'You held us at gunpoint to prevent us from boarding Eden!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woman', 3: 'You left us behind like junk, now you dare to come back and "rescue" us? Are you kidding me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woman', 3: "Get out of here! I don't need your fake compassion now!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The person she is confronting is none other than Hans.'}
{3: 'His starched and pressed uniform had been stained.'}
{3: 'Almost like someone had poured a bucket of dirty water on him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'Chief Commander Hans!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'You—!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'By the time you rush over, the two of them are about to clash.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you hear the distant serenade of the "whale song."'}
{3: 'The serene and resonating sound floats gracefully in the wind like a bird through the clouds.'}
{3: 'It sounds close yet distant.'}
{3: 'The sound is not grating, but Hans and the old man who had just arrived wince at the same time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "Attention, soldiers! Drop what you're doing and prepare for battle!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hey! Over to the west!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite going to "recharge his batteries," Wanshi had been keeping watch this entire time. Suddenly, he jumps down from the hill.'}
{3: 'His laziness was now replaced with unprecedented seriousness.'}
{3: 'Soon, everyone realizes the gravity of the situation.'}
{3: 'Because a large number of Punishing Hetero-Creature burst out of the yellow sand and begin to pursue him.'}
